Params: {3: 'The terminal suddenly emits a lot of noise. Noctis recalls that he was fiddling with it in the morning.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Hello, Commandant? Can you hear me? Hope I didn't break it... How unlucky.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis is feeling rather gloom due to the faulty terminal and having no progress in his investigation.'}
{3: 'Still, his alertness is unaffected. A group of people is coming at him.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "How convenient! Just when I'm having a bad mood, there are sandbags coming my way!", 4: '1'}
